msbt.message: Hey, I heard that ain't feelin' too well lately.Maybe you oughta stop by and throw a blanket on or somethin'.
Hey, did you know that is feelin' kinda down and out lately? If you got some time, maybe stop by and visit. See how doin' and whatnot.
I'm not one for gossipin', but did you hear that is feelin' sick? I'm only sharin' because I think really appreciate a visit, and maybe a nice cup of .
